dict.acceptation: 失去的；迷路的；不知所措的；
遗失，失去( lose的过去式和过去分词)；（使）失去（所需要的东西，尤指钱）；（因事故、年老、死亡等）损失；浪费；

sent.orig: And one of the great pleasures of Lost is how things happen you don't expect.
sent.trans: 看LOST最大的乐趣之一，就是出乎意料的事件。

sent.orig: How does not knowing when Lost could end affect your current storytelling choices?
sent.trans: 对LOST什么时候能结束心里没数，会对当前的故事发展有什么影响？

sent.orig: That was such a good model for Lost.
Lost is about a bunch of people stranded on an island.
sent.trans: LOST讲的是一群人受困在一个小岛上。
